summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2872 for the improvement of Davis Place from Dearborn Street to Bush Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, opening, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, and doing such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith, under Ordinance No. 34946, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
